mapper.insert: insert into alg_r_user_module_call_trans (umc_sn, ver_sn, call_usr_sn, owner_usr_sn, start_time, end_time, duration, billed_call_cnt, call_pay_amount, mod_call_cnt) values (#{umcSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{callUsrSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownerUsrSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{duration,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{billedCallCnt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{callPayAmount,jdbcType=REAL}, #{modCallCnt,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update alg_r_user_module_call_trans set ver_sn = #{verSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, call_usr_sn = #{callUsrSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, owner_usr_sn = #{ownerUsrSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, duration = #{duration,jdbcType=BIGINT}, billed_call_cnt = #{billedCallCnt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, call_pay_amount = #{callPayAmount,jdbcType=REAL}, mod_call_cnt = #{modCallCnt,jdbcType=BIGINT} where umc_sn = #{umcSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select umc_sn, ver_sn, call_usr_sn, owner_usr_sn, start_time, end_time, duration, billed_call_cnt, call_pay_amount, mod_call_cnt from alg_r_user_module_call_trans where umc_sn = #{umcSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select umc_sn, ver_sn, call_usr_sn, owner_usr_sn, start_time, end_time, duration, billed_call_cnt, call_pay_amount, mod_call_cnt from alg_r_user_module_call_trans
mapper.sql: select umc_sn, ver_sn, call_usr_sn, owner_usr_sn, start_time, end_time, duration, billed_call_cnt, call_pay_amount, mod_call_cnt from alg_r_user_module_call_trans
mapper.select: select callTran.umc_sn, callTran.ver_sn, callTran.call_usr_sn, callTran.owner_usr_sn, callTran.start_time, callTran.end_time, callTran.duration, callTran.billed_call_cnt, callTran.call_pay_amount, callTran.mod_call_cnt,alg_module.mod_name from alg_r_user_module_call_trans callTran left join alg_module_version version on callTran.ver_sn=version.ver_sn left join alg_module alg_module on version.mod_sn =alg_module.mod_sn where callTran.call_usr_sn =#{callUsrSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
